title: Newly equipped - Chamissokiez - Quiet
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


The apartment is located in Berlin-Kreuzberg, close to  Chamissoplatz, a few minutes away from Bergmannstraße. In the street there are only historical houses from the 19th century. An organic farmers' market is held every Saturday at Chamissoplatz, two minutes away.  In walking distance you’ll find a lot of nice Restaurants, Cafés and the Tempelhofer Feld. Five Minutes away are the U7/ Gneisenaustraße and U6 / Platz der Luftbrücke.
The apartment consists of a small anteroom, a bedroom with a new double bed, 140 x 200, a living room with an new sofa, table and writing corner, a bathroom with a new bathtub and a newly equipped kitchen with induction hob/oven, refrigerator and new dishwasher.
The apartment is on the third floor, north-south-direction. The bedroom opens to a car-free, quiet backyard.  Towels and bed linen are available. The apartment has been extensively renovated and is available for a first occupancy.
In the bathroom is a new washing machine (AEG). A bicycle can be parked in the common storage room on the first floor.
Availability: from 1th July for 12-15months. Size: 52 sqm. The rent is 1262 per month including everything  
wifi internet can be added (TBC). Please note: no elevator. No smoking or pets please. Because we have renovated everything new, we have to insist on the usual net three months deposit: ca 3000 euros.
